author: markt
msg: While Java 8 supports SNI, if you want different certs for different hosts then you have to manually parse the incoming TLS bytes to look for the SNI extension. This makes it 'interesting'. The idea at this point is to do it as part of the handshake. This will require moving the SSLEngine init code to processSNI() - that is the next step.
Fix some Java 8 Javadoc issues while I was in the area.
